channel.title: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: This is the textbook for Intro to CS.

item.title: CS Concepts
item.author: altcs@ksu.edu (K-State CS Faculty)
item.description: The basic building blocks of computer science theory and programming, along with a bit of history!

item.title: The Internet
item.author: altcs@ksu.edu (K-State CS Faculty)
item.description: A fundamental part of today’s world! Let’s learn how it works, and how we can write webpages ourselves!

item.title: CS Topics
item.author: altcs@ksu.edu (K-State CS Faculty)
item.description: An overview of some of the most important topics, research areas, and cool ideas in computer science!

item.title: AP Alignment
item.author: altcs@ksu.edu (K-State CS Faculty)
item.description: This section contains details and evidence for how this course is aligned with the AP Computer Science Principles course and exam.
